title: A Much Needed Trio!
content: I have pretty much always been a Tampax Pearl user. The brand is reliable, I can always find their products in store & most importantly, they are comfortable! I think it's great that this trio pack exists because it offers protection from regular to super heavy flows. This trio pack can also protect your wallet a little too because women would be less likely to have to purchase each variety individually. I appreciate that this Tampax Pearl Triple pack is free of perfumes, dyes & elemental chlorine bleaching. Tampax Pearl is also clinically tested to be gentle on skin & is the #1 Gynecologist recommended tampon brand.
